sentence.Network_en: The coat an essential feature of the Otterhound.
sentence.Network_cn: 被毛也是奥达猎犬的基本特征之一.

sentence.Network_en: The Otterhound is amiable, boisterous and even - tempered.
sentence.Network_cn: 奥达猎犬是和蔼的 、 吵闹的狗,性格平静.

sentence.Network_en: The Otterhound should be a loose lead.
sentence.Network_cn: 奥达猎犬的牵引应该显得松弛.

means.word_mean: 1. hardy British hound having long pendulous ears and a thick coarse shaggy coat with an oily undercoat; bred for hunting otters
